channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Eurythmics at the BBC
channel.desc: A collection of Eurythmics' best moments from the BBC's music archives, showcasing the bold, innovative, stylish and unpredictable pair who became one of Britain's biggest bands of the 1980s.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: TOTP2
channel.desc: A dip into the archives to explore both collective hits and solo singles spanning 20 early years of Genesis history, from the art-rock Gabriel era to 1980s pop superstars.

channel.title: The Human League - Young Guns Go for It
channel.desc: Members talk about the three distinct groups that have existed under the banner of the Human League, the Sheffield synthesiser band that enjoyed huge success.
